## CourseStructureJSON.getUserTool() method

Gets the tool by user- and tool-id

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  userId | string | The id of the user |
|  toolId | string | The id of the tool |
